rules.description: hyperkey + t to open new teams
hyperkey + v to open visual studio code
grave accent and tilde to left option 7
left command + 7 to left shift + option + 8
left command + 0 to left shift + option + 8
Use left command + i to open Dev Tools (all browsers)
left shift + grave_accent_and_tilde to single quote
left command + right arrow on code to command + option + right arrow
left command + left arrow on code to command + option + left arrow
command + right arrow to command + option + right arrow in chrome
command + left arrow to command + option + left arrow in chrome
